title: TwoFactorAuthLoginRequest
description: Used to login when two factor authentication is enabled.

userId.description: The id of the user that attempted to authenticate.

twoFaToken.description: The token that was included in the error response when authenticating.

otpCode.description: One time password (e.g. generated by the authenticator application, depending on the otpType value)

enum.name: TOTP
enum.description: A time-based one time password that is generated by authenticator applications. Default to this if not present.

enum.name: RECOVERY_CODE
enum.description: A single use code used as a backup for 2FA
